.. _`bwa aln`:

BWA ALN
=======

Map reads with bwa aln.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule bwa_aln:
        input:
            "reads/{sample}.{pair}.fastq"
        output:
            "sai/{sample}.{pair}.sai"
        params:
            index="genome",
            extra=""
        log:
            "logs/bwa_aln/{sample}.{pair}.log"
        threads: 8
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/bwa/aln"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
